item.title: Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani Re-Release Opening Weekend Box Office: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone film racing towards Rs 200 crore club - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani Re-Release Opening Weekend Box Office: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone Film Approaching Rs 200 Crore Mark

Published on: January 05, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The re-release of Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani saw significant audience demand, leading to an increase in showings and impressive box office returns during its opening weekend.

  • The film re-released on approximately 700 shows, expanding to over 2100 shows by Sunday.
  • Collected Rs 6.50 crore over the opening weekend, bringing total collections to Rs 185.95 crore.
  • Initially released in 2013, the film previously earned Rs 178 crore.
  • Friday opening was Rs 1.10 crore, with a jump to Rs 3.20 crore on Sunday.
  • The film is expected to enter the Rs 200 crore club if current trends continue.
“The success of YJHD in re-release also emphasizes the importance of popular music in the world of movies.”

With a stellar performance at the box office, the re-release of Yeh Jaawani Hai Deewani signifies a strong demand for romantic comedies, suggesting a shift in audience preferences towards this genre over action-heavy films.

item.title: JYP’s New Boy Group KickFlip Reveals Member Profiles And Debut Schedule - soompi
item.description:
JYP’s New Boy Group KickFlip Reveals Member Profiles And Debut Schedule

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Soompi

On January 6, JYP Entertainment officially introduced the seven members of their rookie boy group KickFlip and unveiled the schedule for their upcoming debut. KickFlip will make their official debut with their first mini album on January 20 at 6 p.m. KST.

  • The seven members of KickFlip include Kyehoon, Amaru, Donghwa, Juwang, Minje, Keiju, and Donghyeon.
  • The pre-release song “Umm Great” has already been launched.
  • The full debut mini album is set to release on January 20, 2025.
  • Member profiles with birthdates were shared, showcasing each member's individual images.
“Are you excited for KickFlip’s debut? Check out their pre-release music video for 'Umm Great' here!”

This marks an important step for JYP Entertainment as they introduce a new generation of talent into the K-Pop scene.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan made Gauri Khan convert to Islam after 33 years of marriage in Mecca? Here's the truth behind - India.com
item.description:
Shah Rukh Khan made Gauri Khan convert to Islam after 33 years of marriage in Mecca? Here's the truth behind viral picture

Publication Date: Source: India.com

Shah Rukh Khan and Gauri Khan have been a respected couple in Bollywood, married for over 30 years. Recently, a viral photo suggested Gauri converted to Islam, creating controversy online.

  • The couple has maintained a harmonious family environment celebrating both religions.
  • The viral image of Gauri’s conversion was confirmed to be an AI-generated fake.
  • Shah Rukh and Gauri's relationship is celebrated for transcending religious barriers.
The photograph circulating online is not real. It was an AI-generated fake image.

This incident highlights the challenges celebrities face with manipulated content circulating on social media.

item.title: Renu Desai opens up about Akira Nandan’s acting debut - 123telugu
item.description:
Renu Desai opens up about Akira Nandan’s acting debut

Published on Jan 5, 2025 9:00 pm IST

Renu Desai has shared her feelings about her son, Akira Nandan, who is on the brink of making his acting debut, highlighting his burgeoning fan base and career prospects.

  • Akira, son of actor Pawan Kalyan and Renu Desai, has garnered a considerable following prior to his debut.
  • Renu Desai announced her eagerness to see Akira on screen but emphasized that the timing of his debut will depend on his own wishes.
  • Akira is also pursuing higher education in filmmaking in the USA after completing his studies in Pune.
  • The anticipation builds for his future in Tollywood, with fans excited about his potential contributions to cinema.
“But it’s his wish. It (acting debut) will happen whenever he expresses his willingness,” said Renu Desai.

Akira’s journey into the film industry is highly anticipated due to his family legacy and his own talent, promising to be a significant development in Telugu cinema.

Horoscope Today Live: Today's horoscope provides insights on love, career, and health, guiding individuals toward a fulfilling day.

item.title: Junaid Khan opens up about missing out on Aamir Khan's Laal Singh Chaddha and Kiran Rao's Laapataa Ladies - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Junaid Khan opens up about missing out on Aamir Khan's Laal Singh Chaddha and Kiran Rao's Laapataa Ladies

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Times of India

In a recent interview, Junaid Khan shared details about his decision to turn down roles in Aamir Khan's Laal Singh Chaddha and Kiran Rao's Laapataa Ladies, citing that Kiran believed Sparsh Shrivastava was more suited for the part.

  • Junaid Khan felt that he made the right choice in not pursuing certain roles.
  • Kiran Rao's suggestion played a significant role in his decision-making process.
  • The actor reflected on the importance of casting in films and how it impacts the final product.
“Kiran just said Sparsh Shrivastava is better for the part,” remarked Junaid Khan.

Junaid's insights highlight the collaborative nature of filmmaking and the discussions behind casting decisions.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection day 32: Allu Arjun film continues blockbuster run, crosses ₹1200 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 32

Date: Jan 05, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2 continues to perform exceptionally well at the box office, surpassing ₹1200 crore in collections in India after 32 days since its release.

  • The film earned ₹6.15 crore on its 32nd day.
  • Overall collections at ₹1205.15 crore as of 8 PM on January 5.
  • The film had a record-breaking opening weekend of ₹725.8 crore.
  • The Hindi dubbed version crossed the ₹800 crore milestone.
  • Pushpa 2 is produced by Mythri Movie Makers.
“It is the first Hindi film to achieve this feat,” regarding the ₹800 crore mark.

Pushpa 2 was directed by Sukumar and stars Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil.

item.title: Magizh Thirumeni: Ajith sir and I didn't want to take audiences for granted - Cinema Express
item.description:
Magizh Thirumeni on Collaborating with Ajith Kumar for Vidaamuyarchi

Publication Date: [Not provided]

Source: [Not provided]

Filmmaker Magizh Thirumeni expresses cautious optimism regarding his collaboration with Ajith Kumar on the film Vidaamuyarchi, emphasizing the need to respect audience intelligence and deliver a logical narrative.

  • Magizh and Ajith had long intended to collaborate, dating back to Meaghamann.
  • Magizh has been pigeonholed as an action director but desires to explore various genres.
  • He aims to create a film that respects the audience's intelligence, with Vidaamuyarchi being a logical action thriller.
  • Magizh credits his reading habits for shaping his filmmaking perspective.
  • The production faced delays, but Magizh was well-prepared and adapted accordingly.
“I urge the audiences not to carry any preconceived notion about the film, and I can guarantee that it will be an engaging film worth your time.”

In conclusion, Vidaamuyarchi is positioned as a thoughtful narrative that prioritizes story and logic over typical masala elements.

item.title: Coldplay Gets A Notice Ahead Of Ahmedabad Concert, Chris Martin And Group Asked To Not Use... - News18
item.description:
Coldplay Receives Notice for Ahmedabad Concert

Date: January 05, 2025

Source: News18

Days ahead of Coldplay's concerts in Ahmedabad, a notice has been sent to Chris Martin and the organizers to prohibit the use of children on stage and enforce strict sound levels.

  • Coldplay will perform in Ahmedabad on January 25 and 26 at Narendra Modi Stadium.
  • A notice requests no children on stage and mandates hearing protection for children at the venue.
  • Organizers must not exceed sound levels of 120 decibels during the concert.
  • The notice follows a complaint regarding the impact of loud sounds on children's health.
  • Due to high demand, a second show was added after the initial announcement.
“Due to unprecedented demand, a 5TH SHOW has been added in India for Coldplay!” - BookMyShow

This notice aims to ensure the safety and health of children during large concerts while accommodating the overwhelming response from fans.

item.title: Winners Of The 2024 MBC Drama Awards - soompi
item.description:
Winners Of The 2024 MBC Drama Awards

Date: January 5, 2024

Source: MBC

MBC has celebrated another year of successful dramas, with the ceremony honoring the network’s dramas from the past year, which was temporarily postponed due to a national tragedy.

Key Points:

  • Daesang (Grand Prize): Han Suk Kyu (“Doubt”)
  • Drama of the Year: “Chief Inspector 1958”
  • Top Excellence Award (Miniseries): Yoo Yeon Seok, Lee Je Hoon, Lee Ha Nee
  • Best Actor: Byun Yo Han, Kim Nam Joo
  • Best Couple: Yoo Yeon Seok and Chae Soo Bin
  • Lifetime Award: Choi Bool Am
  • Best New Actor: Lee Ga Sub, Heo Nam Jun, Chae Won Bin

Notable Quotes:

“I want to express my deep condolences to those who have lost their family. I want to convey my apologies.” - Han Suk Kyu

Congratulations to all the winners!

item.title: Vivian Dsena Was Not Hindu...: Bigg Boss 18 Contestant’s Wife On People Calling Their Marriage ‘Love Jihad’ - Times Now
item.description:
Vivian Dsena Was Not Hindu...: Bigg Boss 18 Contestant’s Wife On People Calling Their Marriage ‘Love Jihad’

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times Now

In a recent interview, Nouran Aly, wife of Bigg Boss 18 contestant Vivian Dsena, spoke out against the backlash they faced regarding their marriage.

  • Nouran faced trolling after marrying Vivian, who converted to Islam.
  • She clarified that Vivian was not Hindu, but Christian before his conversion.
  • The term ‘love jihad’ was used by some to describe their union.
  • Vivian independently studied Islam before converting.
  • She emphasized that their beliefs differ and women in her religion do not convert.
“I did face trolling on the internet that I converted Vivian to Islam; people called it love jihad and all those things.” - Nouran Aly

Nouran's statements shed light on the complexities of their interfaith relationship and the misconceptions surrounding it.

item.title: Ram Charan reveals when he will show Klin Kaara’s face - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan reveals when he will show Klin Kaara’s face

Published on Jan 5, 2025 5:00 pm IST | Source: 123telugu

Global star Ram Charan discusses his personal life and the upcoming reveal of his daughter Klin Kaara's face during a talk show with Nandamuri Balakrishna.

  • Ram Charan shares emotional moments from his personal life, including a touching surprise during the show.
  • He reflects on fatherhood and his experiences with his daughter.
  • The show episode airs on Aha on January 8, 2025, at 7 PM.
  • Ram Charan plans to reveal his daughter's face when she starts calling him "Dad."
“I’ll reveal her face when she calls me ‘Dad.’”

This heartwarming episode highlights Ram Charan's journey as a father and the joy his daughter brings to his life.

item.title: Marco Hindi Box Office Collection Day 16: Unni Mukundan Is Beasting With 130 Times Higher Earning Than The Opening Day! - Koimoi
item.description:
Marco Hindi Box Office Collection Day 16: Unni Mukundan Is Beasting With 130 Times Higher Earning Than The Opening

Date & Source: January 4, 2025 - Koimoi

Unni Mukundan’s Marco is currently outperforming Varun Dhawan’s Baby John at the box office, achieving a total of ₹6.57 crore in its Hindi version after 16 days.

  • Marco's Hindi collections are surprising as they exceed several high-profile films released in 2024.
  • The film earned ₹1.3 crore on its 16th day, reflecting a 52% increase from the previous day.
  • The total earnings are set to approach ₹10 crore soon.
“Marco has taken a jump of almost 130 times from its opening day.”

Marco competes directly with Baby John, which earned only ₹0.80 crore recently. Box office numbers are estimates and have not been independently verified.

item.title: Unstoppable with NBK: Ram Charan’s episode surprises with an unexpected guest - 123telugu
item.description:
Unstoppable with NBK: Ram Charan’s Episode Surprises with an Unexpected Guest

Published on: Jan 5, 2025 Source: 123telugu.com

The episode featuring Ram Charan on Unstoppable with NBK is generating considerable excitement. It showcases the star along with his unexpected guest, his pet dog, Rhyme.

  • Ram Charan appears as the next guest on Season 4 of Unstoppable with NBK.
  • The promo for the episode includes insights from special guests Sharwanand, Vamsi, and Dil Raju.
  • An unexpected highlight is the entrance of Ram Charan’s dog, Rhyme, who plays a key role in the episode.
  • The star humorously shares anecdotes about his relationship with Rhyme, adding warmth and laughter to the show.
  • The episode is set to air on Aha on January 8, 2025, at 7 PM.
“I often send Rhyme to my wife whenever she’s upset with me.” - Ram Charan

The episode promises to be filled with fun and heartfelt moments, celebrating the bond between Ram Charan and his pet.

item.title: At ₹91.55 crore, Maharaja is the highest grossing Indian film in China post pandemic - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Maharaja Becomes Highest Grossing Indian Film in China Post-Pandemic

Publication Date: Jan 05, 2025 06:42 PM IST | Source: Hindustan Times

The Tamil film Maharaja, released in November 2024, has become the highest-grossing Indian film in China since 2018, grossing ₹91.55 crore. The film, directed by Nithilan Swaminathan and starring Vijay Sethupathi, opened to a strong reception.

  • Maharaja has set a record as the highest-grossing Indian film in China post-pandemic.
  • The film collected approximately ₹15.6 crore on its opening day.
  • It is hailed as one of the highest-rated Indian films on Douban with a rating of 8.7/10.
  • The film's success follows a diplomatic accord between India and China regarding border tensions.
  • Previous Indian box office hits in China include films by Aamir Khan, such as Dangal and Secret Superstar.
“Maharaja has become the highest-grossing Indian film in China since 2018, reaching ₹91.55 crore. Well done!” - Yu Jing, spokesperson for the Chinese Embassy in India.

The success of Maharaja marks a significant moment for Indian cinema in China, possibly paving the way for future releases.

item.title: At 91.55 crore, Vijay Sethupathi's Maharaja becomes highest grossing Indian film in China in 5 years - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Maharaja Becomes Highest Grossing Indian Film in China

Published on: January 05, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Maharaja is a Tamil film directed by Nithilan Swaminathan, starring Vijay Sethupathi, which has achieved great success at the Chinese box office, making it the highest-grossing Indian film in China in five years.

  • The film grossed ₹91.55 crore in China, as stated by a spokesperson from the Chinese Embassy in India.
  • Maharaja became the first Indian film released in China after the October 2024 agreement aimed at normalizing ties between India and China.
  • On its opening day, the film collected approximately RMB 13.37 million (₹15.6 crore).
  • The film is rated 8.7/10 on Douban, a Chinese movie review site, making it one of the highest-rated Indian films in the region.
  • Maharaja was released in India on June 14, 2024, before its release in China.
“Maharaja has become the highest-grossing Indian film in China since 2018, reaching ₹91.55 crore. Well done!” - Yu Jing, Spokesperson, Chinese Embassy

This film's success highlights the growing acceptance and popularity of Indian cinema in international markets, especially in China.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Rajat Dalal, Vivian Dsena, Karan Veer Mehra, Chahat Pandey, top 5 most popular contestants this week - DNA India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Rajat Dalal, Vivian Dsena, Karan Veer Mehra, Chahat Pandey, top 5 most popular contestants this week

Date: January 5, 2025 Source: DNA India

This week, an Ormax Media poll has revealed the top five most popular contestants of Bigg Boss 18. Rajat Dalal continues his reign at the top, followed by other notable names.

  • 1. Rajat Dalal - The fitness influencer remains the most popular contestant.
  • 2. Vivian Dsena - Known as the 'Laadla', has had a disappointing performance.
  • 3. Karan Veer Mehra - Described as the strongest contender if not for biases in the house.
  • 4. Shilpa Shirodkar - A former Bollywood actress maintaining her popularity.
  • 5. Chahat Pandey - Her recent gameplay has weakened, risking her place in the show.
“Rajat Dalal is undoubtedly at the top of the popularity charts.”

The results indicate a dynamic shift in the viewer's preferences as the show inches closer to the Grand Finale set for January 19.

item.title: Sunita Ahuja reveals living separately from Govinda, playfully says, 'In my next life, don’t be my husban - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Sunita Ahuja reveals living separately from Govinda, playfully says, "In my next life, don’t be my husband"

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

Sunita Ahuja shares her experiences of living separately from her husband, Govinda, adding a humorous twist by stating that she wouldn't want him to be her husband in her next life.

  • Sunita Ahuja discusses her current living situation away from Govinda.
  • She highlights their playful relationship with a light-hearted comment.
  • The couple's dynamics are revealed amidst speculation about their bond.
"In my next life, don’t be my husband."

This revelation from Sunita adds a light-hearted layer to their relationship, sparking curiosity among fans.
